other unions backed it as encouraging investment. The bitter campaign split Italy's powerful labor unions. Sergio Marchionne praised the`` courage'' of workers who gave their approval. Saying yes to flexibility makes it possible to achieve very high production levels, of up to 280,000 vehicles per year, and also open the way for the potential creation of jobs, Sergio Marchionne said in a statement.`` In a country such as Italy, which has always been tied to the past and reluctant to change... those who voted yes showed vision,'' he said. artefact is the teenage monarch's gold funerary mask, which stares out from a case on the first floor of the museum. Zahi Hawass said an investigation has been launched to find those behind the theft. The police and army plan to follow up with the criminals already in custody, he added. Should Malta have a consultative referendum on divorce before Parliament votes, or should it have an abrogative referendum after the House decides? Malta should have a consultative referendum before the House votes

While on The Late Show with David Letterman , Kaley Cuoco talked about how she broke her leg during a horse-riding incident last year and the long road to recovery. Now I have two metal bars in my leg, but the good thing about that is I know when it's going to rain, Kaley Cuoco joked.

Despite his support for Barack Obama , Colin Powell would make no commitment yet for the 2012 John McCain House race.`` I will always vote for the person who I think is best qualified,'' he said. I am not committed to any candidate until I see all the candidates. I have not yet seen anybody on the Republican side that I am ready to commit to and I am not committed to Barack Obama either.
